```{r setup}
knitr::opts_knit$set(root.dir = normalizePath(".."))
# reset_copasi(i), ls_corc(pattern), inspect(object)
```

# Copy swig wrapper from copasi build dir

```{r, include=FALSE}
source("development/update-swig-in-package.R", chdir = TRUE)
```

# Document the Package

```{r, include=FALSE}
devtools::document()
```
```{r, include=FALSE}
pkgdown::clean_site()
pkgdown::init_site()
pkgdown::build_home()
pkgdown::build_reference()
# Workaround because it likes to fail
devtools::eval_clean({wd <- getwd(); pryr::subs({setwd(wd);pkgdown::build_articles(quiet = FALSE)})}, quiet = FALSE)
pkgdown::build_news()
```

# Install the Package

```{r, include=FALSE}
devtools::install()
```

# Load the Package

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(CoRC)
```

# Load Development Environment

```{r, include=FALSE}
library(assertthat)
library(purrr)
library(ggplot2)
.data <- rlang::.data

reset_copasi()
```

# Reset Copasi

```{r, include=FALSE}
reset_copasi()
```
